body: Wtf this is amazing

I never knew I needed this
“I’m adorable and my tits are huge!” Absolutely legendary.
Certainly an entertaining read. I've read so many villainess shoujo stories that I've lost count. Though, I was a little unnerved at how far the ML's obsession went.

this one’s weird. Has a lot of things to like but a lot of things to also dislike, so this is like my most conflicted favorite ever. so much emphasis on the trauma here and the actual interesting character of the protagonist (plus her suspiciously bisexual moments with the blonde girl) gives it a bit more weight than doujin with similar topics. I guess that’s a sign it’s well written?

I skipped through most of minutiae, but the plot development is actually interesting. The fuck scenes are hot and well-drawn, unlike unlike most plot-centric smut where the action is borderline static and almost feels glossed over. Even the humor is on-point.
i love the name lily

i didnt like plot, wtf all liked this story in comments? some hursh depressive story with corrupting, killing belowed ones and destroying girls villiage, i didnt care its some parody and its just fiction like someone can write to me, like "story is fresh, original and exiciting, this just diction, chill  out", no, i cant like this story, i envy those who can enjoy this not paying attention to plot and corruption and other shit, and i think those who fully enjoy not only art and sex scenes but plot and all that horrific actions are sick people a bit, just my opinion, dont wanted to offend someone
i liked the plot and the art. 10/10
